# safari_tab_management
Use the best tab manager for safari (Tab Space), enhanced by a new shortcut that shows the managed tabs and goes to the url bar using karabiner remapping. My personal use only.



# Steps
1. Install Tab Space using the apple store (https://mytab.space/)
2. Set safari preferences to show the tab manager on a new tab (http://mytab.space/redirect.html)
3. Set safari preferences to HIDE favorites when focusing on the url bar
4. Import the new (command+t) shortcut on karabiner elements (https://genesy.github.io/karabiner-complex-rules-generator/#)
5. Profit!
6. Screenshots and shortcuts are on this rpeository, only in case I I forget how to do something in the future.
